lead_paragraph: England lock Courtney Lawes has returned to training and will be fit to face South Africa at Twickenham on Saturday, defence coach Paul Gustard said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: England's Lawes Fit to Face South Africa
headline.main: England's Lawes Fit to Face South Africa

snippet: England lock Courtney Lawes has returned to training and will be fit to face South Africa at Twickenham on Saturday, defence coach Paul Gustard said on Monday....
